description: Non-Supine RDI at 4% desat  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-supine body position associated with >= 4% desat) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: rdi4pns = 60*(hrop4 +   hnrop4 + carop4 + canop4 + oarop4 + oanop4)/(remepop+nremepop)

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall Non-Supine RDI at 4% desat
